cryptography is a package which provides cryptographic recipes and

Pure-Python implementation of ASN.1 types and DER/BER/CER codecs
(X.208).

dependencies.description: Python binding to the Networking and Cryptography (NaCl) library.

A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

Fabric is a simple, Pythonic tool for remote execution and deployment
